text: Front-end developer who designs and codes beautiful and responsive websites and apps.
UI Design experience in designing website landing pages and new features for web apps, including creating user flows, wireframes and prototypes.
Back-end developer skills include building APIs using the MVC pattern and database management.
5 years experience working with agile teams (product and development) to help deliver high-quality SaaS solutions in a tech company.
10 years prior experience in design before moving into development.
